paradoxes.name: Laboratory Omniscience
paradoxes.summary: Define all beings by studying a handful in controlled conditions, then generalize to the universe.
paradoxes.example_quote: Our sample of 12 rats confirms the destiny of consciousness.

paradoxes.name: Credentialed Genius
paradoxes.summary: Assign intelligence or worth only if a paper says so.

paradoxes.detected_pattern: Authority of documentation replacing demonstrated ability.

paradoxes.name: Control Through Surrender

paradoxes.name: Authenticity by Algorithm
paradoxes.summary: Seek selfhood through standardized personality metrics.

paradoxes.name: Immortality via Exhaustion
paradoxes.summary: Pursue eternal life by working yourself to death.

paradoxes.name: Meaning by Metrics
paradoxes.summary: Convert purpose into key performance indicators.

existential_recalibration_prompts: State the absurdity aloud and laugh; humor restores scale perception.
Ask: if this policy were a natural ecosystem, would it survive a season?
